feed.title: Parins-Fukuchi Lab at U of T
feed.subtitle: Computational Evolutionary Biology

entry.title: GSA and Entomology Meetings
entry.content: Spoke at two great symposia this month: “Phylogenetic Paleobiology: Exploring Macroevolutionary Trends with Evolutionary Trees” at GSA 2018 in Indianapolis, and “Evolutionary and Phylogenetic Morphology” at Entomology 2018 in Vancouver. Good stuff! GSA slides are here: https://github.com/carolinetomo/GSA2018
entry.summary: Spoke at two great symposia this month: “Phylogenetic Paleobiology: Exploring Macroevolutionary Trends with Evolutionary Trees” at GSA 2018 in Indianapolis, and “Evolutionary and Phylogenetic Morphology” at Entomology 2018 in Vancouver. Good stuff! GSA slides are here: https://github.com/carolinetomo/GSA2018
